Credit Line: The Jefferson R. Burdick Collection, Gift of Jefferson R. Burdick
Heilbrunn Timeline of Art History: The United States and Canada, 1800–1900 A.D.
Description: Trade cards from the "Actors and Actresses" series (N45, Type 1), issued ca. 1888 by Allen & Ginter to promote Virginia Brights, Dixie, Our Little Beauties and Opera Puffs Cigarettes.
